intro: ^! Good news, I finished up the details for the bookmobile visit to the Community Center."
^Rashad?Smiling "We’ll be able to give away free books. I am always excited about free books!"

s: ^That's amazing, Rashad! I love this energy.
^That's cool! Hey, I think I have some helpful information for you.

Chat1: ^Rashad?Neutral "I am really happy about it. It’s the little things that keep me going!"
^Rashad?Smiling "And, we wouldn't have gotten it approved without your help. So thank you!"

s: ^You’re so humble. There’s nothing little about that. You’re amazing!
^Speaking of, I have some information for you!

Chat2: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hah, you’re too kind! Speaking of which, did you ever find out about those therapy questions? Don't worry if you didn't have the time."

s: ^I made the time because you matter! Here's what I have..

ReadyToSolve: ^. I should’ve reached out to you sooner! Thanks for your help! What did you find?"

s: ^Here are my suggestions...
^Give me a second. I want to make sure my information is correct.
^They picked Option 1.
^They picked Option 2.
^They picked Option 3.
^They picked Option 4.

Option1: ^Rashad?Neutral "It figures that insurance would be a pain, but that’s pretty self-explanatory. Did you come up with something a little more meaty?"

s: ^Hold tight! I’ll be right back.

Option2: ^Rashad?Smiling "These online tools seem like a real time-saver. All of the information out there can be a little overwhelming so being able to comb through it quickly is super valuable."
^Rashad?Smiling "I found a pediatrician who went to undergrad with Cheryl and a dentist who could handle kids who bite, but I never thought to look for Black therapists."
^Rashad?Smiling "It could really make a difference to see someone who gets it... That’s a real game changer."

s: ^It’s a great way to narrow in on exactly what you need!

Followup31: ^Rashad?Smiling "Lila really is a jack of all trades. Is there anything she doesn’t know? I probably would’ve gotten into therapy a lot sooner if I knew these online tools make it this easier..."

s: ^Better late than never!

Option3: ^Rashad?Neutral "Teletherapy, huh? I might explore that once I find someone. Right now I want to prioritize finding someone that I’ll gel with."
^Rashad?Neutral "Did you come up with any information on the process of narrowing down my options?"

s: ^Hold on! I’ll be right back.

Option4: ^Rashad?Smiling "Okay. I’m following. I didn’t know there were so many different types of therapy."
^Rashad?Smiling "I thought it all involved a doctor in a sweater vest next to a patient sitting on a couch. Or someone with a pocket watch … I guess I watched too much television."

s: ^It’s a lot to digest, but you got this!

Followup32: ^Rashad?Smiling "I find it difficult to be vulnerable since so many people in the community rely on me, but maybe I need a shoulder to cry on, too."
^Rashad?Smiling "It’s comforting to know that what I say in therapy doesn’t leave the room. I want people to continue to feel like they can count on me."

s: ^You can’t take care of others if you don’t put yourself first.
^It’s okay to not be okay. You’re still amazing!

SolvedGoodbye: ^. I feel like the search for a Black therapist feels a little more approachable now."

s: ^My pleasure, Rashad!

TempGoodbye: ^Rashad?Neutral "You know I’ll be here when you get back."

s: ^I know you will! Sit tight!
